edu.ntnu.sair.controller

Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ntnu.sair.controller.RequestController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/request")
 @Controller
public class RequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by chun on 3/5/15.
    RequestController: Offer the interfaces for the client to authenticate the user by REST.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllTeamLocations

        @Scope(value="prototype")
 @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/getAllTeamLocations",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String getAllTeamLocations(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="uuid")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String uuid,
                                                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="sendingTime")
                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String sendingTime)
        Offer the interface for the client to request all location reports from the server
        Parameters:
        username - username for the user
        uuid - unique id for the user together with device id
        sendingTime - timestamp when sent from client
        Returns:
        result with string type as a json or a xml format

        @Scope(value="prototype")
 @ResponseBody

public java.lang.String getPeriodTeamLocations(@RequestParam(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String username,

                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String endTime)

        username - username for the user
        uuid - unique id for the user together with device id
        sendingTime - timestamp when sent from client
        startTime - start of the period
        endTime - end of the period

        result with string type as a json or a xml format
